article.title: Raytheon Receives More Than $81 Million for Airborne Sonar Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Integrated Defense Systems, Portsmouth, Rhode Island, is being awarded a $81,700,000 firm-fixed-price contract to procure 24 MH-60R Airborne Low Frequency Sonar Systems and all associated program management support for lot nine production. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
